A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: like a lot of people did\, I had to watch this movie more than once before I gave my official thoughts on it. There were several parts that left the fanboy in me screaming like a little girl\, but there were also several parts that made me feel like Im having my time wasted. All in all\, this was a good sequel to The Force Awakens\, not a pefect sequel\, but a good one.
